languages.text: {n}Обведя взглядом побоище, Владайм брюзгливо и сухо произносит:{/n} "Какой бардак. Благодарю Вашу Светлость, что помогли мне разобраться с ним. Ваша помощь была неоценима, но Миссия Касбаллики все же постарается оценить ее самым щедрым образом".

{n}Vladaym surveys the carnage and says, dryly and morosely,{/n} "What a mess. Thank you for helping me deal with it, Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship. Your help has been invaluable — but the Kasballica Mission will nonetheless try to approximate and match its value in the most generous of terms."
languages.original_text: {n}Обведя взглядом побоище, Владайм брюзгливо и сухо произносит:{/n} "Какой бардак. Благодарю Вашу Светлость, что помогли мне разобраться с ним. Ваша помощь была неоценима, но Миссия Касбаллики все же постарается оценить ее самым щедрым образом".

Your help has been invaluable — but the Kasballica Mission will nonetheless try to approximate and match its value in the most generous of terms."
traits.speaker: Footfall_Vladaym_Ch04

languages.text: {n}弗拉迪姆看着眼前大屠杀的景象，忧郁地开了口。{/n}“简直是一团糟。感谢您帮助我解决这件事情，大人。您的帮助是无价的，但即便如此，卡斯巴利卡集团将会以最慷慨的条件，来尽量报答您的帮助。”
languages.original_text: {n}Vladaym surveys the carnage and says, dryly and morosely,{/n} "What a mess. Thank you for helping me deal with it, Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship. Your help has been invaluable — but the Kasballica Mission will nonetheless try to approximate and match its value in the most generous of terms."

traits.locale_text: {/n}弗拉迪姆看着眼前大屠杀的景象，忧郁地开了口。{n}“简直是一团糟。感谢您帮助我解决这件事情，大人。您的帮助是无价的，但即便如此，卡斯巴利卡集团将会以最慷慨的条件，来尽量报答您的帮助。”
traits.speaker: Footfall_Vladaym_Ch04

languages.text: {n}ヴラダイムは殺戮の様子を観察し、乾いた不機嫌そうな口調で言い放った。{/n}「なんてこった。対処を手伝ってくれてありがとう、陛下よ。何と礼をしたらいのか。しかし、カスバリカ聖務団はいずれ、その価値に最も近い、最も手厚い条件で応えようとするだろう」
languages.original_text: {n}Vladaym surveys the carnage and says, dryly and morosely,{/n} "What a mess. Thank you for helping me deal with it, Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship. Your help has been invaluable — but the Kasballica Mission will nonetheless try to approximate and match its value in the most generous of terms."

traits.locale_text: {n}ヴラダイムは殺戮の様子を観察し、乾いた不機嫌そうな口調で言い放った。{/n}「なんてこった。対処を手伝ってくれてありがとう、陛下よ。何と礼をしたらいのか。しかし、カスバリカ聖務団はいずれ、その価値に最も近い、最も手厚い条件で応えようとするだろう」
traits.speaker: Footfall_Vladaym_Ch04

languages.text: {n}Vladaym observa la carnicería y dice, malhumorado:{/n} «Qué desastre. Gracias por ayudarme a solucionarlo, mi{mf|lord|lady}. Su ayuda no tiene precio, pero la Misión Kasballica intentará, no obstante, aproximarse a igualar su valor de la forma más generosa posible».
languages.original_text: {n}Vladaym surveys the carnage and says, dryly and morosely,{/n} "What a mess. Thank you for helping me deal with it, Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship. Your help has been invaluable — but the Kasballica Mission will nonetheless try to approximate and match its value in the most generous of terms."

traits.locale_text: {n}Vladaym observa la carnicería y dice, malhumorado:{/n} «Qué desastre. Gracias por ayudarme a solucionarlo, mi{mf|lord|lady}. Su ayuda no tiene precio, pero la Misión Kasballica intentará, no obstante, aproximarse a igualar su valor de la forma más generosa posible».
traits.speaker: Footfall_Vladaym_Ch04

languages.text: {n}Vladaym überblickt das Gemetzel und sagt trocken und mürrisch:{/n} "Was für eine Schweinerei. Danke für Eure Hilfe dabei, Euer {mf|Lord|Lady}schaft. Sie war von unschätzbarem Wert, doch die Kasballica-Mission wird dennoch versuchen, ihren genauen Wert zu taxieren und großzügigst zu entlohnen."
languages.original_text: {n}Vladaym surveys the carnage and says, dryly and morosely,{/n} "What a mess. Thank you for helping me deal with it, Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship. Your help has been invaluable — but the Kasballica Mission will nonetheless try to approximate and match its value in the most generous of terms."

traits.locale_text: {n}Vladaym überblickt das Gemetzel und sagt trocken und mürrisch:{/n} "Was für eine Schweinerei. Danke für Eure Hilfe dabei, Euer {mf|Lord|Lady}schaft. Sie war von unschätzbarem Wert, doch die Kasballica-Mission wird dennoch versuchen, ihren genauen Wert zu taxieren und großzügigst zu entlohnen."
traits.speaker: Footfall_Vladaym_Ch04

languages.text: {n}Vladaym observe le carnage puis vous dit d'un ton morose :{/n} « Quelle pagaille... Merci de m'avoir aidé à régler cette histoire, Votre Seigneurie. Vous m'avez été d'une aide précieuse, croyez bien que la Mission de la Kasballica saura se montrer très généreuse. »
languages.original_text: {n}Vladaym surveys the carnage and says, dryly and morosely,{/n} "What a mess. Thank you for helping me deal with it, Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship. Your help has been invaluable — but the Kasballica Mission will nonetheless try to approximate and match its value in the most generous of terms."

traits.locale_text: {n}Vladaym observe le carnage puis vous dit d'un ton morose :{/n} « Quelle pagaille... Merci de m'avoir aidé à régler cette histoire, Votre Seigneurie. Vous m'avez été d'une aide précieuse, croyez bien que la Mission de la Kasballica saura se montrer très généreuse. »
traits.speaker: Footfall_Vladaym_Ch04

languages.text: {n}Katliama göz gezdiren Vladaym; ruhsuz, moralsiz bir sesle konuşuyor.{/n} "Ne karmaşa ama. Çözüme kavuşturmakta yardım ettiğiniz için teşekkürler {mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri. Desteğiniz paha biçilemez olsa da Kasballica Misyonu, bu desteğe cömert bir şekilde değer biçmek ve karşılık vermek konusunda elinden geleni yapacaktır."
languages.original_text: {n}Vladaym surveys the carnage and says, dryly and morosely,{/n} "What a mess. Thank you for helping me deal with it, Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship. Your help has been invaluable — but the Kasballica Mission will nonetheless try to approximate and match its value in the most generous of terms."

traits.locale_text: {n}Vladaym katliama göz gezdiriyor ve ruhsuz, moralsiz bir sesle konuşuyor:{/n} "Ne karmaşa ama. Çözüme kavuşturmakta yardım ettiğiniz için teşekkürler {mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri. Desteğiniz paha biçilemezdi ancak Kasballica Misyonu yine de bu desteğe en cömert bir şekilde değer biçmek ve karşılık vermek konusunda elinden geleni yapacaktır."
traits.speaker: Footfall_Vladaym_Ch04
